Row.Text: Our people are now writing in Diwani script and displaying decorative carpets in their homes. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

All our generals agree; gunpowder will revolutionise warfare. In order to ensure the Turkish war machine remains the greatest, it is paramount that we commission for our army, muskets and bombards, and train our soldiers in their use, beginning our transition into a Gunpowder Empire. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Turks [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Physics [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain the Gunpowder technology [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Two free Musketmen and a free Bombard appear at you [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital

All our generals agree; gunpowder will revolutionise warfare. In order to ensure the Turkish war machine remains the greatest, it is paramount that we commission for our army, muskets and bombards, and train our soldiers in their use, beginning our transition into a Gunpowder Empire. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain the Gunpowder technology [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Two free Musketmen and a free Bombard appear at you [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
Found the Enderun Academy

As the world changes, so too do our enemies adapt to our advanced technologies, and it becomes not enough to possess a larger or more advanced military. We must, then, face our enemies with soldiers trained in military enlightenment.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Turks [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital must have a military garrison of at least level 3 [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Establishes the Enderun Academy in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital

As the world changes, our enemies adapt to our advanced technology, and it becomes not enough to possess a larger or more advanced military. We must, then, face our enemies with soldiers trained in military enlightenment.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Establishes the Enderun Academy in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
Enderun Academy
+10XP for newly trained Gun and Mounted Units, and Lancer Units trained in this city become Sipahi.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Rate at which Great Generals are born is increased by 20%.

Enderun Academy was established by Mehmed II in Constantinople. Promising devsirmes (often kidnapped Christian children from the Balkans) and sons of prominent Ottoman officials were trained in literature, theology, engineering, mathematics etc. at Enderun, preparing them for government service as civil servants and janissaries. The janissaries became rivals to the landed Timariot sipahi soldiers that made up the bulk of the Ottoman army, and tensions were inevitable between the two classes.
Re-Population Efforts
With our capture of the former capital city of the {1_CivName}, {2_CityName}, our chief ministers have proposed that we invest in an effort to see the city re-populated with Turks.[NEWLINE]
Excellent! I shall invest lucratively. In fact, it shall become my new capital!

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital loses 3 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_CityName} gains 3 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_CityName} becomes your new [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR]
We have made a lucrative investment in the re-population of {1_CityName}.
{1_LeaderName} has re-located his capital to the former capital city of the {2_CivName}, {3_CityName}.
A good plan. I shall invest cautiously.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital loses 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_CityName} gains 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population[ENDCOLOR]
We have made a moderate investment in the re-population of {1_CityName}.
A ridiculous plan. The ministers are lucky to have their heads.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have rejected the proposal to invest in the re-population of {1_CityName}.
Merchant's Patronage

A daring merchant from the city-state of {1_CityState} has approached us with an opportunity for the financing of a Turkish navy. They believe that the Turkish empire is a magnet for economic prosperity, and that patronizing her conquests would be of great benefit to merchants the world over.
We most readily accept.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain 3 free Naval Units[ENDCOLOR]
We have agreed to accept a merchant's patronization.
We'll take no assistance.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have refused to accept a merchant's patronization.
GÃ¼lbahar Hatun
